explanation: This section provides information about the website, its purpose, and the team behind it.
Here, users can manage their applications related to their projects, such as submissions for approvals or certifications.
This section allows you to calculate the energy performance of your building.
This area allows users to view and manage their certifications or awards related to their projects.
The dashboard is your home screen, where you can see all your activity at a glance.
This page is shown when users encounter an error or a page cannot be found.
Users can manage their files here, including uploading documents or viewing files related to their projects.
Similar to the reset section, this allows users to initiate a process to recover their forgotten password.
This section offers guidance and FAQs to help users navigate the site and troubleshoot common issues.
This is the main landing page of the website, providing an overview of what the site offers.
This section allows you to log into the system to save/load/modify your projects.
This provides a summary view of the user's profile, including key information and statistics.
This section is dedicated to password recovery and management options for users.
This section allows users to view and edit their personal profile information.
This section allows users to manage their projects, including creating, editing, and viewing project details.
This section allows you to register as a new user in the system.
This section provides users with the means to reset their password if they have forgotten it.
This section allows you to configure your preferences and account settings.
